def_en: A hive is a structure in which bees are kept, which is designed so that the beekeeper can collect the honey that they produce.

def_cn: 熙熙攘攘的场所;人群忙碌的地方
def_en: If you describe a place as a hive of activity, you approve of the fact that there is a lot of activity there or that people are busy working there.
Hives is a condition in which patches of your skin become red and very uncomfortable and itchy.
